report.title: Annotations for REST API
report.description: Retrieves record annotations to support the REST api module. Compatible with the standard report filter parameters.
report.query: select #columns# from occurrence_comments oc join cache_occurrences o on o.id=oc.occurrence_id join occurrences occ on occ.id=o.id join cache_taxa_taxon_lists ttl on ttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id join users u on u.id=oc.created_by_id and u.deleted=false join people p on p.id=u.person_id and p.deleted=false #agreements_join# #joins# where #sharing_filter# and oc.deleted=false and ttl.external_key is not null #idlist#

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include

column.name: StatusCode
column.sql: case oc.record_status when 'V' then 'G' when 'R' then 'R' when 'D' then 'A' else /* fallback for old comments */ case when oc.comment like 'Verified%' or oc.comment like 'This record is assumed to be correct' then 'G' when oc.comment like 'Dubious%' or oc.comment like 'Query%' then 'A' when oc.comment like 'Rejected%' then 'R' end end

column.name: AuthorName
column.sql: coalesce(oc.person_name, case u.id when 1 then 'anonymous' else p.first_name || ' ' || p.surname end)
